Austin Mayor Steve Adler: s claim was fact-checked by PolitiFact Texas and rated as False on the Truth-O-Meter.
The claim was made by Mayor Adler during: AM's "Todd and Don Show" on May 8, 2018.
The claim was based on data from the U: S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, as cited by Mayor Adler's spokesperson, Jason Stanford.
According to the data provided by the Au: the Austin-Round Rock-San Marcos metropolitan area had a 3.6 percent increase in nonfarm payroll jobs between March 2017 and March 2018, ranking sixth among the selected regions in raw jobs gained.
